room_title: Escape room "Santa's Sleigh Ride" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: These rooms are awesome! Have done escape rooms in many different cities and these are one of the best. The rooms make you feel like you are really in the scenario. Took the kids to the Santa room and we all had a great time! You could not go to a better place!

room_title: Escape room "Santa's Sleigh Ride" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: Had an awesome family experience doing the Santaâ€™s Sleigh Ride room. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Santa's Sleigh Ride" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: We had my son's birthday party here and it could not have been better! The staff is very friendly and accommodating, the party room is comfortably furnished, and the escape room we did (Santa's Workshop) is challenging but not impossible! Fantastic!

room_title: Escape room "Santa's Sleigh Ride" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: I purchased this experience for my son's birthday and the whole family (including the grands) just did Santa's Workshop this afternoon! What fun! We barely made it out in time :) We will definitely be back to try out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Santa's Sleigh Ride" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: The Santa's workshop room was fantastic! Challenging enough to keep everybody engaged but also there was no point where we were frustrated.Great establishment and well managed by friendly and welcoming management.Highly recommend checking this place out.
